name: C# Developer
description:
Our client - an UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), regulated e-money neo-banking institution that was established with a goal to deliver modern banking services to the customer base of retail institutions on a white label basis.

At the heart of company's technology lies its own core banking system, a highly scalable, very sophisticated software that usually exists only with large high street banks and is very rarely found in fintech institutions.

We are looking for C# Developer with 5+ years of IT industry experience with focus on backend application development.

For this role, you must be an enthusiastic self-starter, dedicated to securing the company technical ecosystem while delivering our services using infrastructure as code.

  • Main technology stack: .Net Core Framework, Microservice Architecture, RabbitMQ, Docker Environment, Kubernetes, RDBMS PostgreSQL, MS SQL, Gitlab, CI/CD, Jenkins.
  • You will be responsible for architecting new features for our customers, refactoring existing code to be more scalable, secure with focus on performance while seeing changes through to completion in a live production environment.

About benefits:

  • Official contract with you as a PE;
  • Collaborative team;
  • Completely remote work;
  • Flexible working hours;
  • Medical insurance;
  • 24 working days annual paid leave.

We are only considering candidates ready for relocation (Cyprus and etc).
